page.title: 19Alongside The A339
page.content: On the busy A339 the{West Kingsclere {Garage}sells 4 star,2 star and diesel fuels and has facilities for car repairs and servicing.Used cars are sold from the forecourt along with Calor Gas.Next to the garage is the {Little Chef}restaurant which is open from 7a.m.to 10p.m.It provides a variety of simple menus such as chips, egg and sausage.It is not licenced to sell liquor.The{Star Inn}by contrast serves traditional country meals such as pigeon pie and is fully licenced. These two restaurants have opened recently,showing the increasing trend to eat out. Further along the road,horse boxes and trailers can be bought or hired from{J&B Towing.The Farm Shop at Catts {Farm}sells fruit,vegetables and pet food.There are plans to build a leisure centre here.
